sourcesContent:
import React from "react"; import { Form } from "react-bootstrap"; export default function EventForm() { return (
Title setTitle(e.target.value)} /> Description setDescription(e.target.value)} /> Spoken Language setLanguage(e.target.value)} /> City setCity(e.target.value)} /> Country setCountry(e.target.value)} /> Price setPrice(e.target.value)} /> Duration setDuration(e.target.value)} /> Enter duration in hours Picture URL setPictureUrl(e.target.value)} /> Max Group Size setMaxGroupSize(e.target.value)} /> Tags setTags(e.target.value)} />
); }
